short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add fun to your time in internet. You can select one of the images set to replace boring ads with art.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of distracting ads? AdsToArt is here to enhance your browsing experience by replacing intrusive ads with captivating images of your choice. Customize your internet with art, animals, or any visual theme that inspires you!

Key Features
*Seamless Ad Replacement: Automatically swaps ads with carefully curated images, providing a clean, distraction-free browsing experience.

*Choose Your Image Set: Select from multiple themed image sets to personalize your browsing space. Whether you prefer fine art, nature, or something playful, AdsToArt has you covered.

*Simple to Use: Enable with a single button and let AdsToArt work in the background.

*Lightweight & Fast: Optimized for minimal impact on performance, ensuring smooth and efficient browsing.

*Whitelist: If you have a problem with some of website you can simply disable extension for this website by adding it to whitelist. 

How to Use
Install AdsToArt from the Chrome Web Store.
Activate the extension with the toggle in your toolbar.
Choose an Image Set and enjoy a refreshing, ad-free browsing experience!
Download AdsToArt now and make the web a more beautiful place!
